verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> together, and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> that you should <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be to you an <S%H6944>holy<s%> day, a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
You shall <S%H1197>kindle<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> throughout your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> you from among you an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> is of a <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> let him <S%H935>bring<s%> it, an <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5178>brass,<s%>
And <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair,
And <S%H352>rams'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> and <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%>
And <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> and <S%H1314>spices<s%> for <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and for the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
And <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and for the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>
And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted<s%> among you shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded;<s%>

The <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and his <S%H4372>covering,<s%> his <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> and his <S%H7175>boards,<s%> his <S%H1280>bars,<s%> his <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and his <S%H134>sockets,<s%>
The <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof, with the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat, and the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>covering,<s%>
The <S%H7979>table,<s%> and his <S%H905>staves,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and the show <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
The <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> also for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> and his <S%H3627>furniture,<s%> and his <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> with the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%>

And the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and his <S%H905>staves,<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> at the <S%H6607>entering<s%> in of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%>

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, with his <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4345>grate,<s%> his <S%H905>staves,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot,<s%>
The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> his <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H8179>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%>
The <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords,<s%>

The <S%H899>cloths<s%> of <S%H8278>service,<s%> to do <S%H8334>service<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H3547>priest's<s%> office.
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>departed<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5375>stirred<s%> him up, and <S%H3605>every<s%> one <S%H834>whom<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> made <S%H5068>willing,<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5656>service,<s%> and for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came,<s%> both <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> as many as were <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H3820>hearted,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2397>bracelets,<s%> and <S%H5141>earrings,<s%> and <S%H2885>rings,<s%> and <S%H3558>tablets,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold:<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5130>offered<s%> offered an offering of <S%H2091>gold<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair, and <S%H119>red<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> them.

<S%H3605>Every<s%> one that did <S%H7311>offer<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H8641>offering:<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> it.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> that were <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted<s%> did <S%H2901>spin<s%> with their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> that which they had <S%H4299>spun,<s%> both of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and of <S%H713>purple,<s%> and of <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and of fine <S%H8336>linen.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5375>stirred<s%> them up in <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H2901>spun<s%> <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair.
And the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set,<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and for the <S%H2833>breastplate;<s%>
And <S%H1314>spice,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> and for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and for the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> a <S%H5071>willing<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> made them <S%H5068>willing<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H4399>work,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H6213>made<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

And he has <S%H4390>filled<s%> him with the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> in <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> and in <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H4399>workmanship;<s%>
And to <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4284>curious<s%> works, to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and in <S%H5178>brass,<s%>

And in the <S%H2799>cutting<s%> of <S%H68>stones,<s%> to <S%H4390>set<s%> them, and in <S%H2799>carving<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> manner of <S%H4284>cunning<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

And he has <S%H5414>put<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> that he may <S%H3384>teach,<s%> both he, and <S%H171>Aholiab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

Them has he <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H4399>work,<s%> of the <S%H2796>engraver,<s%> and of the <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H2803>workman,<s%> and of the <S%H7551>embroiderer,<s%> in <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and in <S%H713>purple,<s%> in <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and in fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and of the <S%H707>weaver,<s%> even of them that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> and of those that <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4284>cunning<s%> work.
